text: cea cng su rb nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ theid doythi cea midi thuk bangkhab (hı kenth phu dı) nxkcak taw khxng cea xeng læa cng plukcı brrda phu sraththa dwy pen pi di wa xallxhˌ ca thrng yabyang kalang rb khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa hela nan læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng mi kalang rb thi khemkhæng kwa læa pen phuthrng mi kar lngthosʹ thi runræng kwa
